body.p: You know how I left you at the station to-day. I have thought of it and cannot get it off my mind, so I have come up to ask your forgiveness. I know how I have served you on many occasions before. I know that it is my faltfault and not yours. Can you forgive me and take me back and love me the same I will try by the grace of God to do better. I cannot give you up, and it makes me feel so bad to think how we have spent the last day or two; and all for my temper. I will have to controolcontrol it or it will send me to the states prison or some other bad place. CantCan't you take me back and love me the same.
